workPositions.description:
Results-driven Software Engineer with hands-on experience in designing and developing backend microservices tailored to client requirements. Adept at building scalable, maintainable, and high-performance systems using modern technologies and best practices.

- Designed and developed backend microservices using Java Spring Boot, tailored to client-specific requirements, ensuring scalability, reliability, and maintainability.
- Integrated PostgreSQL for relational data management and Redis for high-speed caching and session storage.
- Implemented asynchronous communication between services using Apache Kafka, enabling real-time event-driven architecture.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to translate business requirements into technical specifications and backend solutions.
- Maintained code quality and version control using GitLab, with CI/CD pipelines to automate testing and deployment processes.

- Built a core backend system from scratch using Java Spring Boot for a web-based application focused on server provisioning.
- Designed and implemented security architecture using Spring Security and JWT tokens to protect REST APIs from unauthorized access.
- Integrated with third-party services for provisioning, server usage monitoring, and implemented pricing calculation using OpenCost.
- Designed efficient and normalized database schemas to eliminate redundancy and planned the overall system architecture.
- Refactored codebase for improved readability, maintainability, and performance efficiency.

- Maintained and enhanced backend microservices using Java Spring Boot, focusing on API improvement and system performance optimization.
- Developed invoicing solutions for B2B financial processes, enabling offer transactions between companies and funding providers.
- Set up dynamic pricing configurations through service gateways to support real-time pricing across integrated systems.

- Full Stack Developer, develop and maintain web API using .NET Core.
- Develop Form Permohonan ijazah using CI/CD and MVC architecture.
- Develop Form Pembicara External using .NET Core and Linq Entity Framework for API and .Net Freamework for frontend application.

- Develop and maintain binusmaya using PHP, codeigniter framework.
- Develop new feature for S3 Scoring for binusmaya Application.
- Develop embedded system for Binus Online.
- Full Stack Developer, develop and maintain binusmaya application.

Tech Stack : PHP, codeigniter framework, ajax and jquery.

Full Stack Developer
- Develop and Maintain Web API using .NET Framework 4.6
- Develop and Maintain Competency Test Website using .NET Framework
- Develop new feature using .NET Framework, MongoDB
- Develop simple authentication & SSO using .NET Core
